summary: This is a notification from the Second Circuit Court of Appeals regarding the curing of a defective document in the case United States v. Maxwell. The document indicates that supplementary papers to a motion filed on behalf of appellant Ghislaine Maxwell were cured and filed.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: She is the appellant in the case United States v. Maxwell, and supplementary papers to a motion were filed on her behalf.

persons.name: Laura Mennin
persons.context: Listed as an attorney of record to receive electronic notice of the docket activity.

persons.name: Adam Mueller
persons.context: Listed as an attorney of record to receive electronic notice of the docket activity.

connections.description: Laura Mennin is listed as an attorney of record for Ghislaine Maxwell, indicating a legal representation relationship.
Adam Mueller is listed as an attorney of record for Ghislaine Maxwell, indicating a legal representation relationship.

events.title: Defective Document Cured
events.description: A defective document, specifically supplementary papers to a motion filed on behalf of Ghislaine Maxwell, was cured and filed in the Second Circuit Court of Appeals.

keyFacts: The document is a notification from the Second Circuit Court of Appeals regarding docket activity in case 20-3061, United States v. Maxwell.
A defective document (supplementary papers to a motion) filed on behalf of appellant Ghislaine Maxwell was cured and filed on September 23, 2020.
Attorneys Laura Mennin and Adam Mueller are listed as attorneys of record for Ghislaine Maxwell and were to receive electronic notice of this filing.
